amendment.description: Amendment permits schools to use Title I funding to establish or enhance prekindergarten programs and specifies criteria for the use of funding that is made available for this purpose. \ As amended by the Goodling amendment (A008), the language specifying the criteria to be followed in the above amendment was deleted.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 9 printed in the Congressional Record to permit schools to use Title I funding to establish or enhance prekindergarten programs and specifies requirements for the use of funding that is made available for this purpose.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A007) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
